name: The Diplomat
description: Not every mission has to end with gunfire or a high speed getaway. You use your charm and your tact to defuse tense situations, win people over, and maintain relationships with your allies. You're a great negotiator, and you know how to get what you need through conversation.

moves.name: Calming touch
moves.description: You can diffuse tense interactions more easily than most (+1 act under pressure)

moves.name: Gesture of goodwill
moves.description: If you give something of value to someone, they are more likely to help you (a 7-9 is treated like 10+ manipulate someone)

moves.name: Carry a big stick
moves.description: If negotiations break down, you're prepared to defend yourself (+1 kick some ass, protect someone)

moves.name: Home field advantage
moves.description: If you are on your home planet, you have the upper hand in negotiations (+1 manipulate someone)

moves.name: Gentle approach
moves.description: Use empathy and compassion rather than intimidation to get information from people (+1 investigate, read a bad situation)

moves.name: Cooler heads
moves.description: Keeping calm has an effect on your allies (+1 help out)

moves.name: Tough negotiator
moves.description: Talk your way out of life or death situations (+1 act under pressure)

items.name: Listening device
tags: listen to conversations at a distance

items.name: Box of goodies
tags: candies and treats from home that you can use to ingratiate yourself to the locals
